REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2248 reute d f BC-STERLING-DRUG-<STY>-S 03-31 0068

TEXT.TITLE: STERLING DRUG <STY> SELLS X-RAY PRODUCTS UNIT
TEXT.BODY: Sterling Drug Inc said it sold the assets of its Greene Dental Products Inc subsidiary to Rinn Corp, an Elgin, Ill., maker of dental x-ray film, supplies and equipment. The company did not disclose the cash purchase price. Greene Dental makes dental x-ray tabs, mount products and record systems. No indication of its size was given. Reuter
